function isValidUrl(url) {
if (!url) {
return false;
}
var encodedUrl = encodeURI(url);
return encodedUrl.match(
/^(https?:\/\/)?(([a-z0-9-]|%[A-F0-9]{2})+\.)+(([a-z]|%[A-F0-9]{2})([a-z0-9]|%[A-F0-9]{2})*)(:[0-9]+)?(\/[a-z0-9;:,~!+#@&=%\/$\.?_-]+)?$/
);
}

function isNumericPrice(price) {
if (!price) {
return false;
}
return price.match(/^([0-9]+\.?[0-9]*)$|^([0-9]*\.[0-9]+)$/);
}

function isEmptyValue(input) {
return !input || input.length === 0 || input.match(/^\s*$/);
}

function truncate(input, length) {
if (!input) {
return ”;
} else {
return input.substr(0, length);
}
}

function formatDate(year, date, month) {
return year + ‘-‘ + month + ‘-‘ + date;
}

function trim(input) {
if (!input) {
return ”;
} else {
return input.trim();
}
}

function resetModalToInitialState(currentMonth, currentDate, currentYear) {
var enableOnlineStoreRadio = document.querySelector(‘#pricingFeedback_onlineRadio’);
var enableOfflineStoreRadio = document.querySelector(‘#pricingFeedback_offlineRadio’);
var onlineStoreInputForm = document.querySelector(‘#pricingFeedback_onlineInput’);
var offlineStoreInputForm = document.querySelector(‘#pricingFeedback_offlineInput’);

var onlineShippingRaw = document.querySelector(‘#onlineShippingRaw’);

var onlineYear = document.querySelector(‘#onlineYear’);
var onlineCalendar = document.querySelector(‘#onlineCalendar’);

var offlineStoreName = document.querySelector(‘#offlineStoreName’);
var offlineCity = document.querySelector(‘#offlineCity’);
var offlineState = document.querySelector(‘#offlineState’);
var offlinePriceRaw = document.querySelector(‘#offlinePriceRaw’);
var offlineDay = document.querySelector(‘#offlineDay’);
var offlineMonth = document.querySelector(‘#offlineMonth’);
var offlineYear = document.querySelector(‘#offlineYear’);
var offlineCalendar = document.querySelector(‘#offlineCalendar’);

var thankYouDiv = document.querySelector(‘#pricingFeedback_thank’);
var errorDiv = document.querySelector(‘#pricingFeedback_error’);
var submitButton = document.querySelector(‘#pricingFeedback_submit’);
var loadingGifDiv = document.querySelector(‘#loading’);

var stateDefaultOption = document.querySelector(‘#stateDefaultOption’);
var stateDefaultPrompt = document.querySelector(‘#stateDefaultPrompt’);

if (thankYouDiv) {
thankYouDiv.innerHTML = ”;
}
if (errorDiv) {
errorDiv.innerHTML = ”;
}
if (loadingGifDiv) {
loadingGifDiv.innerHTML = ”;
}
if (submitButton) {
submitButton.style.display = ‘block’;
}
onlineUrl.value = ”;
onlinePriceRaw.value = ”;
onlineShippingRaw.value = ”;
offlineStoreName.value = ”;
offlineCity.value = ”;
offlineState.value = ”;
offlinePriceRaw.value = ”;

stateDefaultOption.innerHTML = $(“#selectProvince”).val();
stateDefaultPrompt.innerHTML = $(“#selectProvince”).val();

setInitialStates(
onlineMonth,
currentMonth,
offlineMonth,
onlineDay,
currentDate,
offlineDay,
onlineYear,
currentYear,
offlineYear,
onlineStoreInputForm,
offlineStoreInputForm,
enableOfflineStoreRadio,
enableOnlineStoreRadio,
onlineCalendar,
offlineCalendar
);
}

From the brand

We understand pets are like family and have worked hard to developed products for both you and them to enjoy. Our collections have wide variety of designs and sizes in order to suit your pets needs and fit into any home style. We’ve curated thoughtful products that are both functional for your pet and timeless in design. You will be able find everything you need to help your furry friend feel right at home.

Shop Storage Bins

Shop Ceramic Food Bowls

Shop Food Mats

More to love from Bone Dry!

Polyester Polyamide Microfiber
PERFECT TOWEL TO DRY SMALL, MEDIUM, AND LARGE DOGS AND CATS: Bone Dry Pet Towel measures 41×23.5″ and is great for drying dogs and cats of different breeds and sizes
MATERIAL AND CARE: Towel is made of ultrasoft microfiber, machine washable, and super absorbent, making drying your pet easy; For best long lasting results, do not use fabric softener
LIGHTWEIGHT DURABLE AND EASY TO CARRY: This towel can be stored in your car for on the go trips for your pet or at home; Provides comfort for your pet and protection for your couch, carpet, car, bed, floor, or chair
KEEP YOU PET WARM AND COZY: Great for grooming, traveling, a pet kennel, or cage to keep your pet warm, cozy and comfortable
MORE BONE DRY PET PRODUCTS: Bone Dry is a highly trusted brand for pet accessories; Click Bone Dry above to view more of our products


Pet Towels

DII Bone Dry microfiber dog bath towels with embroidered paw print or bone are durable, absorbent, and fast drying. These microfiber dog bath towels are long lasting and machine washable. Quickly dry off your pet after bath time with DII super absorbent pet towels.

Lightweight and easy to care for, this towel can be stored in your car for on the go trips for your pet or at home.

Great for grooming, traveling, in a kennel, or cage to keep your pet warm, cozy and comfortable.

Visit Our Brand Page

To view more of DII’s pet products visit our official site for our entire selection.

  • Wicker Pet Baskets – Three Sizes!
  • Pet Storage Bin-Three Sizes in Various designs
  • Non-Skid Pet Food Bowl- Three Sizes with Various designs
  • Pet Bath Towels
  • Pet Blankets
  • Pet Bed-Machine Washable!
  • Cage Liner and Under Cage Mat

Read more

DII Bone Dry Pet Products





Wicker Pet Basket

DII wicker pet toys and accessories storage or home décor bone shape basket comes in three sizes: 18 inch long by 7.5 inch tall, 21 inch long by 78 inch tall, and 24 inch long by 9 inch tall These wonderful baskets easily clean with a damp wet cloth or sponge. DII wicker baskets are dark espresso in color with a modern look making this a great décor piece for your home. The lid securely latches to keep your pet from opening, so no more sneaking treats! The convenient handle makes it easy to transport or move when needed. DII wicker pet baskets are perfect for holding dog treats, leashes, toys, blankets and more!

Pet Bed

DII Bone Dry Ultra Plush Padded Pet Bed is perfect for your dog or cat. Elevated sides block drafts and also give your pets a place to rest their head on. Available in various sizes to fit a variety of breeds. Made of durable Oxford fabric and filled with premium polyester fiber for added support. Our Ultra Plush Padded Pet Bed is machine washable and cushion is removable making cleaning super easy. Give your pet the perfect place to cuddle while adding stylish décor to your home with DII Bone Dry Ultra Plush Padded Pet Bed.

Ultra-Absorbent Microfiber Pet Mat

Bone Dry Microfiber Pet Mat provides your pet with their own dining area to minimize mess. It absorbs spills and keeps their eating area nice and dry. This pet placemat is made of super absorbent microfiber and immediately absorbs any slop, splash or spill. A great piece for your pet’s kennel or cage – maximum absorbency ensures that your pet is not lying in spilled water while you are away. Protect your carpets and hardwoods from water spills or food stains with DII’s absorbent pet mat.

Cuddly Pet Blankets

DII Bone Dry absorbent microfiber pet blankets come in an assortment of colors and excellent for travel or nap time for your adorable pet. DII offers wonderfully made absorbent microfiber pet blankets that features a cute and adorable bone shape design and are heavenly soft to touch. These pet blankets are perfect for your pet to lie on while in a car, crate, and kennel to keep your pet warm, cozy, and dry.

Read more





Microfiber Plush Mop Mitt Towel

The best towel for drying your pet. Each side is sew together allowing for pockets for your hands. These pockets give you the ability to quickly run the towel up and down your pet and dry quickly. Microfiber Chenille will quickly grab dirt and water off of your pet, 10 times more absorbent than cotton. Because of this, your towel is picking up more moisture on your pet. Your pets will dry faster, making bath time a lot easier.

Non-Skid Ceramic Pet Bowl

DII Bone Dry Non-Skid Ceramic Pet Bowl is perfect for your dog or cat – suitable for food and water and available in various designs and sizes. The bowl is conveniently dishwasher safe so it can be easily cleaned. The silicone rim at the bottom will keep your pet’s bowl from sliding around on the floor, which means no more messy floors for you to clean. Delight your hungry pup with this ceramic bowl in a fun print with a stay-put silicone bottom.

Pet Storage Bin

DII pet toys and accessories rectangle storage basket comes in three sizes. The neutral colors and subtle texture of these baskets makes them great décor pieces for your home. The storage basket stands upright and the convenient handles make it easy to transport or move when needed. DII pet toys and accessories round storage baskets are perfect for holding dry dog treats, leashes, collars, toys, blankets, outfits, grooming supplies, and more!

Bone Dry Pet Toy

Bone Dry loves pets! Our Pet Toy collections are great way to bond with your furry pal. Buy one or a pair today to make tails wag and dog owners smile. Our squeaky dog toys provide comfort and satisfies your dog’s natural urge to chew. With so many characters to choose from in different toy styles our DII Bone Dry toys are great for hours of fun. Perfect for your pooch to entertain themselves or a bonding experience with you and your pet.

Read more

(as of Nov 30,2022 05:10:30 UTC – Details)

From the brand

Why choose our UV light flashlight instead of others?

Focus on R&D and Sales of Innovative UV Flashlights Series for 10 years! Come To Join Our Vansky Brand UV Flashlight Family With Over 10 Million Satisfied Customers!

What makes our products unique?

Our UV Flashlights are Made of Ultra-Tough High-precision Aluminum Throughout, and HD Brightness Led Lamp Beads are Like the Eyes of An Owl Looking for “PREY” at Night.

What kind of customer shopping experience can you get ?

With Experienced and Professional Team, Vansky Continuously Pursues Innovation and Sound Growth, and are Striving to Provide Customer An Extraordinary and Comfortable Shopping Experience.

Vansky UV Light Flashlight

Find invisible stains: UV flashlight helps detect food stains and pet urine stains on rugs, carpets, and clothes that are otherwise invisible to the naked Eye. Not work well on cat urine
Versatile use: authenticate currency and official documents like drivers licenses or identify unwanted whitening agent in cosmetics
Perfect for outside use such as finding scorpions and minerals! Shoul used with 3xAA Standard Alkaline Battery (Battery Not Included)
Durable, high-quality lads: the 51 tenacious UV light LEDs have a lifespan of 15 years
Ultra-compact design: The pocket-size UV flashlight can be carried along to detect stains in your car or illuminate minerals, body art

  • Voltage:4.5V
  • Material:Aluminum Alloy
  • Runtime:4-6 Hours on Full Battery
  • Battery:3xAA Standard Alkaline Battery (Not Included)

Emits 390 to 395 nanometer wavelength

The strong Aluminum alloy body makes this product durable and long lasting, and the large head with 51 LED makes this flashlight brighter than others products.

  • Can only spot dried urine stain;
  • Does not work on reflective surface or carpet with fluoresce;
  • The ultraviolet led black light works best in dark environment, the darker it is, the better it works;
  • For few dark color carpets, the reflected stain color will be very close to the color of the carpet, making it harder to see;
  • Remove all batteries if you did not intend to use it for a long time.

Read more

Scorpions Finder

If you live in or are traveling to a scorpion prone area, UV lights are an easy way to detect these hazardous pests, day or night.

Pets Urine Detector

Revealing dry dog and rodent stains and unfavourable spots that couldn’t see with the naked eye.

Glow Party World

Looking to light up your party, or next halloween celebration, then this is the way to go.

BALENNZ Men’s Athletic Shorts

ASIN ‏ : ‎ B08C29X77C

Machine Wash
BOOST PERFORMANCE: We use soft fabric to bring you sports shorts for men that offer just the right balance of softness, breathability, and stretchiness to keep you comfortable throughout your workouts
10-INCH INSEAM: Whether you’re working out at the gym or running on the track, our men’s gym shorts have you covered. They are suitable for all your sports and workout activities including gym, cycling, running, basketball, football, tennis and more
POCKETS ON BOTH SIDES: Thanks to the hand pockets, you can easily carry your wallet, smartphone, and other small accessories when working out or traveling. These mens athletic shorts can be paired up with other clothing to create your own look
BREATHABLE & QUICK DRYING: Our breathable sports shorts for men wick moisture away from the skin while being gentle and quick-drying so you can workout, train and push your limits while staying comfortable and feeling dry
GET THE RIGHT FIT: Our men’s workout shorts feature an encased elastic waistband which coupled with the inner drawcord makes sure you get the perfect fit every time. Our shorts stay comfortably in place whether running or training without sliding up or down








Long Sleeve Tee Shirts for Men Moisture Wicking Quick Dry
Moisture Wicking Golf Shirt Quick Dry Golf Polos for Men
Athletic Women’s Gym Performance T Shirts Workout Shirts
Moisture Wicking Quick Dry Workout Shirts for Women
Quick Dry Workout Shirts for Men Athletic T Shirts
Moisture Wicking Quick Dry Athletic Men’s Gym T Shirts
Material Polyester Polyester and Spandex Polyester Polyester Polyester Polyester
Size Option S-3XL S-3XL S-2XL S-2XL S-3XL S-3XL

Support Your Performance While Staying Comfortable With Men’s Activewear Shorts

Whether you’re working out or just playing sports, you need clothes that can keep up with your active lifestyle. This is why we designed our athletic shorts for men to provide you with a simple and fashion-forward way to stay comfortable and dry throughout the day to help you take your performance to the next level.

We made our moisture-wicking running shorts to make your daily workout routine easier and comfier. This is why we use carefully chosen materials that offer just the right balance between breathability and comfort with a fashion-forward yet simple design so you can slip these workout shorts on and head out knowing you’ll look just as good as you feel.

The Perfect Fit

These shorts have an adjustable drawstring and elastic closure that make sure they stay firmly and comfortably in place all day. You can easily adjust the tightness for a custom fit that’s not too tight or loose so you can move around and stretch without worry.

Side Pockets

Our mens gym shorts are designed with 2 side pockets that provide you with all the storage space you need to keep your keys, wallet, smartphones, and other accessories safe and within arm’s reach whether at home or on the go.

Easy To Maintain

The men’s athletic shorts are machine washable and quick-drying to take the hassle out of keeping them clean. Simply machine wash with cold water without using bleach or fabric softener and tumble dry on low – that’s it.

Read more

Made For Daily Use

Besides being perfect for sports and workouts, our breathable shorts for men with pockets are suitable to wear even when lounging around your home, on the go, parties and any other occasion you have in mind making them ideal for daily wear.

Read more

Enjoy A Better Workout Experience

No athletic wardrobe is complete without a comfortable pair of workout shorts. We designed our quick-drying sports shorts to provide just the right fit for any activity you have in mind to give you the support you need to keep pushing your limits.

Our men’s athletic shorts are made for people that don’t want to settle. They wick away moisture from the skin to stay cool and dry throughout the day which coupled with their lightweight and comfortable feel make them perfect for workouts, basketball, football, tennis, baseball, badminton, boxing, cycling, running, hiking, and much more.

Support Your Performance While Staying Comfortable With Men’s Activewear Shorts

Whether you’re working out or just playing sports, you need clothes that can keep up with your active lifestyle. This is why we designed our athletic shorts for men to provide you with a simple and fashion-forward way to stay comfortable and dry throughout the day to help you take your performance to the next level.

We made our moisture-wicking running shorts to make your daily workout routine easier and comfier. This is why we use carefully chosen materials that offer just the right balance between breathability and comfort with a fashion-forward yet simple design so you can slip these workout shorts on and head out knowing you’ll look just as good as you feel.

The Perfect Fit

These shorts have an adjustable drawstring and elastic closure that make sure they stay firmly and comfortably in place all day. You can easily adjust the tightness for a custom fit that’s not too tight or loose so you can move around and stretch without worry.

Side Pockets

Our mens gym shorts are designed with 2 side pockets that provide you with all the storage space you need to keep your keys, wallet, smartphones, and other accessories safe and within arm’s reach whether at home or on the go.

Easy To Maintain

The men’s athletic shorts are machine washable and quick-drying to take the hassle out of keeping them clean. Simply machine wash with cold water without using bleach or fabric softener and tumble dry on low – that’s it.

Read more

Made For Daily Use

Besides being perfect for sports and workouts, our breathable shorts for men with pockets are suitable to wear even when lounging around your home, on the go, parties and any other occasion you have in mind making them ideal for daily wear.

Read more

Enjoy A Better Workout Experience

No athletic wardrobe is complete without a comfortable pair of workout shorts. We designed our quick-drying sports shorts to provide just the right fit for any activity you have in mind to give you the support you need to keep pushing your limits.

Our men’s athletic shorts are made for people that don’t want to settle. They wick away moisture from the skin to stay cool and dry throughout the day which coupled with their lightweight and comfortable feel make them perfect for workouts, basketball, football, tennis, baseball, badminton, boxing, cycling, running, hiking, and much more.

From the brand

PetLab Co. Products

How did we get our start?

PetLab Co. was formed with a simple mission: to provide comfort and support for pets.

What makes our products unique?

If an ingredient is not beneficial then you won’t find it in our products. We work alongside experts to ensure that each ingredient is purposeful and up to our high standards.

Why do we love what we do?

Motivated by results and happy customers, we have created products that make a difference in both owners’ and pets’ lives. Producing delicious, simple, and effective supplements to support a healthy and active life.

Country of Origin ‏ : ‎ USA

EASY TO APPLY: This paw soother balm comes in an easy-to-use twist stick, so you can quickly apply it to your pup’s paws before and after walks
MOISTURIZING DOG PAW BALM: In addition to soothing and moisturizing, this paw wax can also support your dog’s paws by providing a barrier from internal and external irritants
WORKS ALL YEAR LONG: Our dog paw moisturizer is ideal for both summer months, when paw licking can be at its height, and winter months, when paw dryness is more common
POWERFUL INGREDIENTS: Thanks to its natural ingredients like organic shea butter and coconut oil, this dog paw balm is not only beneficial, but it’s also gentle
PREMIUM PRODUCTS – Our dog health supplies are exclusively manufactured in the USA with domestically and globally sourced ingredients
